item.title: Bardo Pond - Melt Away
item.description: Información del álbum facilitada por discogs.com: Fecha de lanzamiento: 2024 Géneros: Rock Estilos: Psychedelic Rock, Stoner Rock Pais: UK, Europe & US Votos: Media de 4.67 con 3 votos Sello: Matador Recorded At: Studio Red (2) Recorded At: Cycle Sounds Recorded At: Lemur House Copyright (c): Bardo Pond Pressed By: GZ Media Artwork - John Gibbons Artwork - Michael Gibbons Co-producer, Engineer - Jason Cox (2) Photography By [Rear Photo] - Bert Queiroz
